meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Cyprus.
meanings.sent1: In Cyprus, you can buy many things with just a few koppas.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for koppas when I visited Cyprus.
meanings.sent3: Why did the koppas go to school? To learn how to make cents!
meanings.sent4: The koppas jingled in my pocket like tiny bells of wealth.
meanings.sent5: The shiny koppas sparkled in the sunlight, tempting me to spend them.

meanings.definition: A type of ancient Greek coin.
meanings.sent1: Archaeologists found a collection of koppas buried in the ruins.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a rare koppas from the ancient Greek era.
meanings.sent3: The koppas rolled off the table and into the history books.
meanings.sent4: The koppas clinked together like echoes of a distant time.
meanings.sent5: The koppas bore the faces of long-forgotten rulers, frozen in metal.

meanings.definition: A type of punctuation mark used in the International Phonetic Alphabet.
meanings.sent1: The koppas in the phonetic alphabet help indicate a pause in speech.
meanings.sent2: Linguists use koppas to mark the end of a sentence in phonetic transcriptions.
meanings.sent3: The koppas danced across the page, adding rhythm to the words.
meanings.sent4: Her voice rose and fell like the curve of a koppas in the text.
meanings.sent5: The koppas acted as silent sentinels, guarding the boundaries of speech.
